nodes.text: The universe, also known as the known universe, was the enormous expanse of space in which galaxies resided, including the galaxy and its companion galaxy, the Rishi Maze.

The ancient Jedi text known as the Rammahgon contained four conflicting origin stories of the Force and the cosmos. The Fourth Precept was a poem, which described deities fighting in the primeval universe.
It was said that when Force-sensitive beings connected with the Force, they were becoming one with the universe.
